text: Mark Appleyard (born November 11, 1982 in Oakville, Ontario) is a Canadian professional skateboarder. He is currently sponsored by Thunder Trucks, Globe Shoes, and Glassy Eye Wear. He was the Thrasher Skater of the Year in 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== *Mark Appleyard's profile at Grindtv.com * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Skateboarders Category:People from Oakville, Ontario
title: Mark Appleyard
